sentence.text: BAB5264 is a male born by vaginal delivery at 34 weeks gestation.
Pregnancy was notable for a low-lying placenta and polyhydramnios.
Physical examination at age 2 years and 4 months revealed: Weight: 10.9 kg (3%), Length: 76 cm (-4 SD).
The mother reported the use of ear tubes and hearing aids but we did not have access to any audiologic tests.
He has astigmatism, reflux, and was considered hyperactive.
